website_summaries.verdict: The Skull Candy Ink'd Wireless is a better Bluetooth headphone than it looks.
pros: The Skullcandy Ink'd is a lightweight, affordable flexible collar-style Bluetooth headphone that offers decent sound and a comfortable fit
It performs fine as a headset for making cell phone calls and has reasonable good battery life
cons: It looks a little cheap, which makes you think it should cost a little less

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I got them for a plane trip out west and they were perfect! I love that they can be used to talk on the phone too completely hands free and wireless. Great sound. I gave 4 stars because people tell me when I’m using them to talk on the phone they tend to pick up all the background noise over my voice
customer_reviews.author: Mary Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I have now had these headphones for about a month & absolutely love them! My husband has had a pair for around 14 months & they are still going strong! Not glitchy & easy to use. Works a good distance from your device & has a great battery life. Nice sound quality & plenty long enough. Mic works well for phone use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Great, while they lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in May and really liked them. They have pretty decent sound. However, less than 3 months later they shut off while I was using them and they won't turn back on. I feel like I should be able to get more than 2 1/2 months out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don't by these buds
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is solid. Its skewed toward being bass heavy. Battery life is admirable. The reason this headset gets one stars from me is the bluetooth connectivity on it is horrible. If you put your phone in your pants pocket the headset disconnects completely. Unacceptable in my eyes. It defeated the purpose of even purchasing these headphones. I actually threw my pair of Ink'd Wireless earbuds in the trash i was so dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: DOA out if the box.
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. I was so disappointed because I have an old set I have owned and abused for 3 yrs. This was going to be my back up. I own several Skullcandy products. This is the first time I have had a bad experience. I went to the Skullcandy web site and really got ticked off. I paid around $28 here for a set that I had to return. Direct from Skullcandy right now is $24.99. I ordered a new set directly from Skullcandy the day I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product in 8/5/18 and 12/7/18 it quit working just after 4 months. First the left earbud quit working and then two days later the right ear bud had no sound. I used the device religiously. I've started a claim with skullcandy since they offter a 2 year warranty but I am no happy to be out of pocket shipping costs for shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bengtson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great last a long time (around 11-12 hours) @ around 75% volume even though the box says 8 hours. The main thing I would change (hence the missing star in rating) is make a spot where the buds could rest when not in use instead of dangling or over your ears to be out of the way. Due to their design the small wires could potentially be ripped off if they got caught on something.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead guy

customer_reviews.title: great product, but it breaks
customer_reviews.text: this was the FOURTH pair of these I bought because I liked how it looked, fit, sounded, and functioned. however four times the headphones just up and died, or one side died. without warning or battery issues. They just didn't work. I looked up this pair online and the common theme I found was to fix it by whacking it against something. I tried it and it didn't work. I wish these were actually dependable because I really like them. but are very inconvenient when I need to continue to replace them
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what you get. Lightweight, good sound (and I am mostly deaf, so that's saying something). The problems: Too lightweight. This thing moves around a lot & bounces right off you when you run. Some weight to it would help keep it in place - as well as a silicone or rubber cover to grip you. The battery isnt really 5 hours. More like 2-3. But still pretty good. The connection is strange in that you will lose connection if you bend over. Its like it needs to stay horizontal. Not a big issue, but you notice it when you reach down or stoop to tie your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stanion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and cheap if you lose them like I do.
customer_reviews.text: What I love about Skullcandy is I know my way around the controls of the headphone and they are the same control logic over all the models so if you want to get a nice product you don't have to relearn the matrix. I won't go back to any other product as they are made in America. They come in different colors and my wife/daughter/son all use these and the different colors are claimed by the different people in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason_in_Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, don't waste your money . .
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after two months of normal use. I used it at the gym and on one trip. should not have broken so soon. I liked them otherwise but I wish I bought a higher end product to begin with so I didn't waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Improved from previous model by secure wire with a secondary band to help prevent the wire from pulling out or damaging the connection, thus having one earbud cut in and out. The charger cover seems to not want to stay in as well as old one but otherwise the performance is comparable and good enough to bring me back for a second purchase. When you consider the price compared to others (very low) and the overall quality and performance this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Loses BT connection at very minimal distance
customer_reviews.text: Audio cuts in and out really bad if your phone is more than 2 feet away from the headphones and is completely non existent if your phone is in your pocket. I've been a skullcandy "fanboy" for about 14 years now and this is the first time I've ever been disappointed. It honestly hurts to give a company I have absolutely loved almost half of my life 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Probably not new..unfortunately!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of skullcandy wireless earbuds and unfortunately these didn’t live up to the first pair. First pair still work fine(purchased at Best Buy). Saw these and thought I’d grab a pair to keep at work. Used these maybe a handful of times and they’ve completely stopped working. I charged them, turned them on and started listening to music. They disconnected and the light indicator turned a faint red color then eventually turned off all together..it’s too bad, wanted to like them. Guess I’ll stick to Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: VIN

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I think these would be better if you don't use them for more than about an hour a day and I don't think they work well if you're going to be moving around a lot. They have a hard time staying connected if the device they're connected to is obstructed in any way say by your hair being long, etc. I've had cheaper $10 bluetooth ear buds that did better than these. They'll be used as backup and that's it. Sucks because the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bud!
customer_reviews.text: Yes- I’ve said it before and i’ll say it again I’m an audiophile snob and extremely particular about earbuds i purchase. These are quality buds. The sound is on point. The bass is strong and the treble is just right. Comfortable fit and finish. Perfect size for my ears. I jog and work out with these and they do not get in the way. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Colonelsheepshank

customer_reviews.title: Charging ability breaks within 30 days - read all the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. I loved the way these sounded, battery life was decent, they worked great for me. BUT 35 days after I got them - 5 days after the warranty expired - they stopped charging. I tried different cords so its not that, it is in the headphones themselves. So at $40, I only got to use them one month and now they are trash. What a waste. I see in the reviews that I am not the only person this has happened to so I would suggest you spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dee from Denver

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought these less than a year ago. Haven't used them much, but when I took them out to use them, they were dead. So I figure it doesn't hold a charge over a couple of months disuse. I charged them last night, the blue light turned on, letting me know they were charged. I put them on today, again they were dead, wouldn't turn on. I plugged them in again and the red light is on, they need to charge again. I didn't use them at all after I charged them last night. They just don't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: THP

customer_reviews.title: I have used these daily for a few months and am so glad I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality cannot be beaten at this price point. I have used these daily for a few months and am so glad I purchased them. The band is lightweight an unobtrusive. The ear buds fit very well and their wires are long enough to not cause issues when moving my head but short enough to not get snagged on clothing or other objects. The battery life is phenomenal, lasting 8 hours+ of constant use. Recharge takes about 30ish minutes from dead to full battery.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfsblood2012

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good
customer_reviews.text: The mic on this thing when making phone calls is insanely clear. Whoever you're calling will hear your every move, so no sneaky pooing if you dont want your boss to know exactly what you are doing... unless you're both into that sort of thing and then these are definitely the headphones for you! Oh and they sound really nice too. Super flexable. Charge lasts forever. Love skull candys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, poor mic
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight headphones for my commute. Sound quality is just fine, nothing fancy, but definitely good enough for this price. However, you can hear the wind passing over your ears even as you walk and there is no breeze, but I mostly just sit on the bus for my commute so it doesn't bother me. The biggest downside is the really poor mic quality. Maybe ok for a quick casual call, but would not use for business calls.
customer_reviews.author: H. Yiu

customer_reviews.title: Lower the price or make sure the quality matches the price.
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning, they're great! The bass is there, they're loud and they fit comfortably, but considering the fact that my brother and I have blown through 6+ pairs within a few months... I don't think they're worth $30-$50. With each pair that my brother and I have used, one side would stop working within days of use and then rubber covering on the buttons start to peel. Also, it's a little annoying having to constantly peel the fold back in order to plug them in for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Mawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It came on time and was well packaged. This is a great product for my boyfriend because he is a welder and needs to wear the gear and protective glasses. It is great because the earbuds do not sit on his ears. The buds are great and do not fall out. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: They work!! Good for the money, but if you use them everyday and you can afford to go with a more expensive product, I think its well worth upgrading. Downside is that their connection range is short — my phone needs to be within a foot to guarantee the connection, otherwise there are dropped words / bars — and they don’t reconnect to your phone automatically when you turn them on.
customer_reviews.author: James Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for about 6 months now. No issues with performance. Sound quality is fine. Battery life is excellent. I can work in the yard all day with power to spare. Recharge is fast. Connectivity is good. Reliably links to iPod or iPhone. Range is as expected, about 30 feet. I’d buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the volume of my phone or laptop turned all the way up, they’re too quiet. Plus the sound is dull and muddy, and terrible compared to the wired Skullcandy earbuds I’ve had. Skullcandy has been my preferred brand for years, but now that everything is moving to Bluetooth, I’ll be buying something else from now on.
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: These, hands down, have literally been the best freaking headphones I’ve purchased to date within their own respective category and price range. If you’re looking for some great quality wireless/Bluetooth headphones at a great price, these are absolutely a winner. Love ‘em!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good for a bluetooth headphone
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are good for the money that you spend. The battery life is decent and they are very lightweight. The only downside is that when listening to music the quality of the sound isn't the greatest, though it is better than other bluetooth headphones that I have tried. They sound great if you are listening to podcasts or audio books.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of junk. I used it 3 times, it worked fine once, next two times it shut down after 30 minutes, and then it wouldn’t turn on at all. Each time it was fully charged. I put it aside for 4 months, thought maybe I’d get lucky and it would magically heal itself, but again, although fully charged it will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair of these earbuds, not sure why they only have a 3 1/2 star rating. They are great quality, durable and very simple to use. You are not getting audiophile sound quality, but you should know that before buying; they are Skullcandy after all. Great for workouts, yard work, traveling, etc......
customer_reviews.author: Corbinwaterski

customer_reviews.title: No sound coming out of one side after about 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones about 1 year ago and I was very satisfied with them. They have great battery life and good sound quality. The reason I gave them 2 stars is because they broke a week ago. There is no sound coming out of side. I treated them well and I think one can expect to use quality headphones for longer than that. I tried to reach out to costumer service about a warranty claim but waited for over 1 hour in the live chat and I didn't get a response. So I man not sure if this falls under the 2 years of warranty that Skullcandy claims to give.
customer_reviews.author: Cora19

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband/ Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased these for my husband who absolutely loves them. He wasn't too happy with the color (he was hoping for black) but I ordered what was in stock. He says the sound quality is great considering the fact that he previously had a pair of Beats by Dre headphones. He was also pleased with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Homeschoolmommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love skull candies by they are one of the only brands that makes ear inserts small enough for mu incredibly small adult ears...however these died after 3 months of use and would not recharge.
customer_reviews.author: A.S Baze

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is way better
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. My luvr stole the other pair. Works great, sounds boss, and powers for like 6 or 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: LOOK ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. 1st pair the left side stopped working because baby pulled on the cord. Loved the sound so bought 2nd pair. Gave 2 stars only because sound quality is good. However the Bluetooth connectivity is terrible. Was semi bad on 1st pair. 2nd pair i's horrible. With otterbox defender case with clip hanging on outside of my pocket still cuts in and out. LOOK ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item shouldn’t be for sale on this page, I’m not happy to lose $$$ like this
customer_reviews.text: I order this item of this brand 2 months ago I really like it and I wait two weeks and no problems perfect sound and I did loved, I decide to buy another one, two months after now and both are dead ..!!!! What a easy way to loos $$$ and there is no way to return or get my money back, just a peace of garbage and so t deserve not even one star as rating
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo E Chavarria

customer_reviews.title: Good for everything but situps
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good, I don't particularly like that i have to hold the + and - buttons to skip tracks and go back, would rather double and tripple click center button. there is a faint hum that i noticed. they fall off when doing situps, annoying but thats the only movement that makes them come off your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Alec D. Fulwyler

customer_reviews.title: Add a clip or some magnets to the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I glued some magnets to the earbuds so they would connect together when not in use. Otherwise they are great. You can use them anywhere around your neck, over your head like old school headphones... with buds, or in the brim of a hat if you have one.
customer_reviews.author: RighteousJB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible connection for this brand at this price
customer_reviews.text: These skullcandy inkd Bluetooth has got to be the worst connection in the business. I have order headphones from this brand because just like this 1 the sound quality is excellent. But for a Bluetooth device it is horrible too many breaks in connections even with mobile device in close proximity.4 stars on sound half of star on connection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to charge after three months
customer_reviews.text: The headphones stopped charging after three months of use. I have tried multiple methods to get them to charge (different ports, cords etc). I even searched the web for potential solutions. Very disappointed as they had a nice sound and were convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are nice they sound pretty decent , the charge lasts for what seems like forever no problems with pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's second pair of skullcandy headphones, we took a chance and ordered these but unfortunately they lasted less than a month. They shut off and won't charge, we are returning them. They were good while they lasted. Very disappointed with the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E. Perry

customer_reviews.title: I love having the controls readily available at my neck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. My first pair lasted longer than any other pair of headphones I had ever bought. I love having the controls readily available at my neck. You can put your phone away and easily control what you are listening to. Excellent battery life. I highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Another Dud from Wirecutter
customer_reviews.text: Another Wirecutter rec in this category that failed in about a week. Blah. I didn't like the necklace thing too much, esp while running, but the sound was good. Till they refused to turn on ever again. RIP "Skullcandy."
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. L. Formichelli

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pairs, both stopped working within the first two months.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality for the price is excellent, however the left earbud has completely gone after only two months of daily use. Update Sep. 2nd 2018: purchased another pair after the first broke, and these have completely stopped turning on after a little over a month. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, but this pair REFUSES to stay synced to my phone. I have to manually tell my phone EVERY TIME to connect. I’m not sure if this pair is defective or if skullcandy changed the product, but they aren’t very good any more. The first pair worked perfectly for a year and a half and with two phones. I’ll keep these, but buyer beware not as good as they used to be!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Selvaggio

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, so I won't comment on sound. But wasn't blown away either. I don't like running in them because I get that rub on the mic sound too much and it blocks out ambient noise. I prefer my aftershokz.
customer_reviews.author: carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not very great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased several Bluetooth headphones and the best ones so far are the ones I bought for under 20 bucks. The audio quality is good but I feel like the in ear ink'd are better. Also, they do not get as loud as I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Zach H.

customer_reviews.title: been riding bike all summer, not one issue!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great, you can advance to next song, back up and hear a repeat, answer calls.
customer_reviews.author: Don Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Eat bud pieces
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why this pair of the same headphones I've already purchased once before in a different color do not come with different size pieces for the ear buds as the others i have bought from the same brand, this is the main reason i buy this same headset every time bc they are one of the only ones that have ear bud fittings that fit my extremely small ear canal
customer_reviews.author: EPonders

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These have a high level of comfort but don’t last more than 6 months with daily use. Have owned 3 sets and it’s very consistent to 6 months of heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: earbuds headphones! They stopped pairing with my phone :(
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but they won't pair with my phone after a few months of using it, making it rather useless. I sometimes still pair it with my computer and it works well. The mic is better than other Bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.author: tomtom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved skullcandy since I was a teenager. They always have high quality sound and amazing price! I love these headphones. I got a replacement of the exact same ones that have lasted years!
customer_reviews.author: tatiana magana

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality great...while it worked. Now it's dead.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great, sounded great...until they didn't. One day, I guess the battery died, and they appear to be charging back up but I can't get them to power on. And now it's too late to return them. Also if I'm running on the treadmill with these the two heavy plastic ends bounce, thus whacking me in the collarbones with every step. I thought bluetooth headphones would be so much more convenient but eff that, I'm going back to wired.
customer_reviews.author: coloradoreeds

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These had the sound quality of a $5 set of wired headphones. Also, they were very uncomfortable in my ears. I was surprised after using a few necklace style headsets that there is no place to stow the earbuds. They just hang loose. It seems like you're paying for all the tacky branding that is all over this thing. I have no idea how they can charge so much for these. I returned them and went back to the basic LG set. So much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: Died after just over a month after purchasing. I assume the battery is junk since the blue light is on when plugged into a charger but doesn't light up or anything once you unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonandonandon

customer_reviews.title: constant static noise
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for better, considering I've always really liked skullcandy wired earbuds--and these are just as comfortable--but these have a constant static background noise and they will not play sound if you try to listen to anything below a certain (rather loud) level, so I don't feel good about using them to listen to music while walking out and about because I worry about being able to hear cars behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brown stains all over
customer_reviews.text: The appearance is terrible. The white is completely stained and this was supposed to be a “like new” open-box item. The headphones easily look like they’re 10+ years old. These should’ve been sold for $5. Had I known, I certainly wouldn’t have paid more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: I've had 2 and both quit working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to workout with. The first one quit working 2 weeks after I received them, wouldn't recharge (and yes I was using the correct charger that came with the package), etc. I was able to send that set back and received another. It worked about a month and quit working, 10 minutes into a workout, after being charged. It was fine while it worked, good sound quality, but I can't recommend due to 2 going bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these due to loving the skull candy brand. overall if it is in a gym they are good. When doing a race last weekend I found that the wind cut through the signal and it had connectivity issues which caused the music to cut in and out which was really annoying. They do however fit well and cancel out noise while in. Overall I give it a 4 star rating because if you are using them outside it could have problems.
customer_reviews.author: kelly theisen

customer_reviews.title: Very good bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. They have pretty good noise cancelling, great for exercising and yard work or even listening to a book. My husband uses them for watching movies on the tablet when we are away from home or traveling. Some stones it won’t let me connect to nluetooth. Have to delete the device and reload.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Guild

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a great warranty! Manufacture took care of issue right away.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: A 3 month life at best
customer_reviews.text: Like a high school/ college girlfriend, they were fun when they lasted, but they never last long. The fit is great, sound is great, but you are only gonna get 3 months out of them. Then they just die, like will no longer turn on die. It has happened to both my wife and I on several purchased pairs, and then again on the warrantied pairs. I am done with SkullCandy!!!
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my fiancé and myself and we both use them every day they’re definitely more valuable than the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. King

customer_reviews.title: more than 8 hours of hearing time.
customer_reviews.text: I charge this thing for two hours and this thing literally lasts me for two days. Granted I'm not listening to it 24 hours. I do however work 9 hours at my job and do heavy phone calls. I like to listen to music while making phone calls. This last me twos days on one charge. My $120 sony wireless headphones don't last two hours. Wish I would have bought this first.
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: No longer turn on after 2 mths
customer_reviews.text: They only lasted 2 mths. They no longer turn on. My other ones also broke after 2 mths. I searched Google and apparently this is common. This sucks so bad because they fit so good and the sound quality is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones. I bought them as a gift for my husband who works long days on job sites, and the battery lasted all day, and then all day the next day. He love them so much I ended up buying a pair for myself, and I absolutely love them. The sound quality is perfect, battery life is beyond great, and they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lakota

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working, Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These broke within two months of light use and getting a replacement from SkullCandy was such a nightmare I just counted it as a loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a week
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well and held charge for a few days. Just last night mid-run they stopped working with 60% life. I plugged them into the wall and the LED light switched from red to blue, but the buttons do not work. I've tried a hard reset and nothing. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but to expensive to only be able to use for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for three months and thought that it was great I loved the headphones loved the sound quality the battery life was amazing but as soon as the half mark hit the left ear bud went out I took really good care by not putting them in my pocket or getting it wet I even went to the extent of only charging it on the charger that was sent with it just wish they would have lasted a while longer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron mazz

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 5 hours
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 hours total of listening, the headphones stopped working. They now will only turn on when plugged into the charger (doesn't do much good that way) and stop working when unplugged. Product support wasn't helpful and asked me to send them back under warranty. After searching for possible fixes, instead of the 5-8 week turnaround on a replacement, I found that A LOT of people have the same issue. They only work for a week or a month maximum, and then the same thing happens.
customer_reviews.author: jjjg315

customer_reviews.title: Clear as a bell!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight & so easy to use! And the sound is So Clear! Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Good for music
customer_reviews.text: They're great for listening to music but doesn't work to well with phone calls. During phone calls they always mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Niesha Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: great price, cool design
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 boys and they love these! But they only lasted them about a month and a half before 2 of the 3 pair that I ordered broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very nice quality pair of wireless headphones. They're comfortable, easy to use, and have great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Isaias

customer_reviews.title: . I like the connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Broke returned after one month the first time and second lasted a week the third pair lasted 6 months you have to make sure u use the little charger cover so crap and water dont get in.. i really like them though cause there super cumfy and batt last long and the conectivity is awsome
customer_reviews.author: Diego dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very long battery life. Great sound quality. Lightweight and durable. Comes with different size earbud cups and a charger also. My favorite Bluetooth earbud
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn't work right
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few weeks ago, started off fine but all of a sudden Bluetooth will disconnect and then a few seconds later reconnect. So they work but every so often I have to go back to my phone to hit play to continue to what I was listening to which is very annoying on a long commute.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: My second set, my first ones died after a year but I don't care for the price and the quality they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return!
customer_reviews.text: This is far from noise canceling. There is no bass whatsoever. If you turn them down it’s hard to hear but up to loud sounds awful. You don’t get the full production of the songs because the quality of sound is so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Elvonsha Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Not for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Love the head phones; but when I started to go to the gym more, I noticed the headphones started to cut on and off, after a month in a half they completely stopped working, but loved them for work
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy sucks
customer_reviews.text: Skullcandy‘s are the worst headphones out there so cheap they break within weeks and haft Of the time when they are sent to you they are broke when ever you get them out of the package ... don’t waste your money or your time something better ... The last three pairs I just got one headphone didn’t work when I got them out of package... you been WARNED Skullcandy sucks
customer_reviews.author: Joshua lee Newman

customer_reviews.title: Works great but wasn’t new...
customer_reviews.text: Love his product. Had to replace my old ones because I wore them out. However!!, I ordered this product new and the box came taped back together and there is some slight wearing on the volume control buttons. This leads me to believe this set was not new but a return. Works great, don’t need to return but was annoyed nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until this week
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in July, 2017, and wore them on bike rides and walks. Worked great until this week, and boom stopped working. Won't charge and will not turn on. Read some online forums, and sure enough this is common for these specific earbuds. Have put in a claim with Skullcandy...cross my fingers they replace. Would probably still buy Skullcandy, but not these.
customer_reviews.author: shirleyp

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: They do NOT charge it even turn on!!!!?waste of time and money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Clean them carefully
customer_reviews.text: Left ear always goes bad within 2 yr max this is my 5th pair
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Graser

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are Amazing!!! Much cheaper than buying them in like wal-mart. They have good sound quality, a long battery life, and are great at canceling out other noise. The color on them is also wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Staymates

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable; Only Lasts for Short Time
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! The fit was perfect, would forget I had the buds in my ears. Just stopped working after about a year of infrequent use, though.
customer_reviews.author: MaryA

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pair for my husband and i. The sound quality is great as well as the battery life. Definately would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, I just don’t personally like the actual piece that goes in your ear. But i know that’s a personal preference
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle and workshop use!
customer_reviews.text: The sound has cut-out issues if I'm more than 10ft from my phone. There perfect on the motorcycle though! And great when I'm working in the shop with tools. Nothing to snag and easy remote usage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Honestly they worked great for about the three times i used them, until they stopped working and would no longer take a charge. I personally have used this brand several times but just disappointed with this products quality.
customer_reviews.author: LucaS Nault

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds in this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of earbuds. Quality is very good at this price point. I’m very pleased with the way it sounds and it’s easy to connect
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of them
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these, one for me and one for my boyfirend. we both go to the gym and they work very nice, cant hear anyting with them in. only issue for me is there is no skipp button but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Cloe b

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Do get the 2 year warranty. Item can loss sound in one ear bud within 6months hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Workouts are Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound it was very well done. Whenever I was working out it would tune everything else out to focus. The only issue with these, if you are looking for something to stay around your neck when you are lifting, I would look for something else. These headphones really did not wanna stay for the life of me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Watson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: sound is perfect long working time but Bluetooth connecting is not perfect
customer_reviews.author: Shon K.

customer_reviews.title: these work great. But put the phone in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Same as others have said, if the phone is just sitting on a desk and not blocked, these work great. But put the phone in your pocket, they suck. Constant disruption. So disappointed in them, especially for the price. Sitting at my desk, they are great, cutting the grass, just go get the wired ones.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Will no longer recharge, it's only been 3and 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones when they worked. I cannot get the headphones to recharge, and yes I am using the original charging cord it came with. :( Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Austin

customer_reviews.title: They don't fall out!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I don't have to worry of losing them while I have them on. I don't do well with traditional earphones
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Espinoza

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Ink'd Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds with Microphone, Noise Isolating Supreme Sound, 8-Hour Rechargeable Battery, Lightweight with Flexible Collar, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteSkull candy ink's Bluetooth wireless earbuds with mic, White (s2ikw-j573) open box. Frequency Response: 20kHz - 20Hz.
feature_bullets: Lightweight design with flex fit collar
